main event: A brightly white oval-shaped object was observed transforming into a horizontal luminous disc before returning to a saucer-like shape.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1.5 hours,The object was observed moving at an altitude of 10 to 15 inches and estimated to be traveling at a visual speed of 260 mph,The object disappeared at an elevation angle of 20 to 30 degrees azimuth, The conclusions included possibilities of it being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical object, The report is part of Project Blue Book documenting UFO sightings.
witness description: General estimated the speed and distance of the object.
